D3000000 085667BA
C0000000 0000006A
10000000 000003E7
DC000000 00000002
D2000000 00000000
{Ignores existing item quantity\n\n'???' items will not display their name until picked up legit at least once.}

[++Fairy Data (v1.6)++]

D3000000 085671D0
D5000000 00000000
C0000000 00000084
20000000 000000FE
D8000000 000000F0
D4000000 00000001
D1000000 00000000
{Food will be in order by ID number (can shift if code is off and more food is found)\n\nOnly gives 254 of each to allow unlocks for each food type}

D3000000 08566980
C0000000 0000000C
90000000 FF000001
2000001B 00000063
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000098
D1000000 00000000
{Bypasses Aura Effect unlocks\n\nFeed any food to unlock them\n\nStats may behave oddly if this code is left on when refreshing}

D3000000 08566980
C0000000 0000000C
90000000 FF000001
20000024 00000064
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000098
D1000000 00000000
{Same effect as feeding 100 food that matched the fairy's base element}

D3000000 08566980
C0000000 0000000C
90000000 FF000001
1000006C 000000FF
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000098
D1000000 00000000
{Same effect as refreshing 255 times.\n\nRefreshing again with this code off will reset the counter to 0}

[++Fairy Rental Skill Codes++]

[Copy Equipped Skill to 2nd Slot (All Fairies)]
D3000000 08566980
C0000000 0000000C
90000000 FF000001
DB000000 0000003F
D8000000 00000094
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
DD000000 00000420
DB000000 00000094
D8000000 00000095
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000820
20000095 000000FF
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000098
D1000000 00000000
{X+Left to copy\n\nY+Left to reset\n\nIntended to customize all fairies at once with independant skill settings\n\nOnly needed when updating/resetting copied skills}

[Copy Equipped Skill to 3rd Slot (All Fairies)]
D3000000 08566980
C0000000 0000000C
90000000 FF000001
DB000000 0000003F
D8000000 00000094
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
DD000000 00000480
DB000000 00000094
D8000000 00000096
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000880
20000096 000000FF
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000098
D1000000 00000000
{X+Down to copy\n\nY+Down to reset\n\nIntended to customize all fairies at once with independant skill settings\n\nOnly needed when updating/resetting copied skills}

[Copy Equipped Skill to 4th Slot (All Fairies)]
D3000000 08566980
C0000000 0000000C
90000000 FF000001
DB000000 0000003F
D8000000 00000094
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
DD000000 00000410
DB000000 00000094
D8000000 00000097
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000810
20000097 000000FF
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000098
D1000000 00000000
{X+Right to copy\n\nY+Right to reset\n\nIntended to customize all fairies at once with independant skill settings\n\nOnly needed when updating/resetting copied skills}

[Apply Copied Skills (All Fairies)]
D3000000 08566980
C0000000 0000000C
90000000 FF000001
DB000000 0000003F
D8000000 00000094
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D9000000 00000094
D6000000 0000003F
DC000000 FFFFFFFC
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000098
D1000000 00000000
{The above 3 codes write to the game's save, so skills don't need to be re-copied every play session\n\nRe-activate this code to re-apply copied skills in future sessions}

[--]
